About the Company: Urja Global Ltd is engaged in power generation businesses in India.The company offers solutions to deliver solar energy to utility, government, and commercial customers. The company also engages in various activities like manufacturing and trading of crystalline photo voltaic (PV) modules, develops and invests in PV based solar power plants, delivers generation services in the field of hydro and thermal power, promotes the use of solar energy and its products and provides solar energy products and after sale services.The product range of the company includes Solar street lights,Solar water hearters,Solar lantern and portable light,Solar panels,Solar battery charger and Solar cookers.
